files.content:
'use client'

import { Label } from '@gentleduck/registry-ui-duckui/label'
import { RadioGroup, RadioGroupItem } from '@gentleduck/registry-ui-duckui/radio-group'
import { toast } from 'sonner'

export default function RadioGroupDemo() {
  return (
    <RadioGroup className="flex flex-col space-y-1 [&>div]:felx [&>div]:items-center [&>div]:space-x-3 [&>div]:space-y-0">
      <RadioGroupItem value="all">
        <Label className="font-normal">All new messages</Label>
      </RadioGroupItem>
      <RadioGroupItem value="mentions">
        <Label className="font-normal">Direct messages and mentions</Label>
      </RadioGroupItem>
      <RadioGroupItem value="none">
        <Label className="font-normal">Nothing</Label>
      </RadioGroupItem>
    </RadioGroup>
  )
}
